About

This site contains a number of blog posts and articles written by me; Enrique.

But who am I?

I help people, companies and dreamers to achieve their potential.

  • I was part of the inception of the manifesto for software craftsmanship
  • I co-founded a great software company, patheleven
  • I have written a book on starting a software project
  • I worked as the Head of Education at Makers Academy.
  • Currently I am a Software Craftsman at 8th Light.

If you have any other questions or just want to drop me a line, please donâ€™t hesitate to do so, I am open to suggestions and ideas!
